import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // This is a static data layer. We shall call our API and load data from // the database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) // Destructing properties from tour obejct const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return ( <>

{title}
) } export default TourDetails
